events.message: I recently received my order but I want to request a refund because the product is not what I expected and I am quite disappointed.
The system has categorized this case as a refund request based on the customer's message about wanting their money back.
An agent has been assigned to the case to handle the refund request promptly and provide assistance.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear that you’re not satisfied with your purchase. I’m here to help you with your refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund to help us process your request faster?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The item didn’t match the description on the site, so I want a full refund.
Thank you for the details. I’ve processed your refund request, and you should see the money back in your account within 5 to 7 business days.
Thanks a lot for your help! I appreciate the quick response and the refund processing.
I have marked your refund request as resolved. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to ensure you received your refund and that everything is resolved to your satisfaction.
Since your refund has been completed and you have confirmed satisfaction, this case is now officially closed. Thank you!
